profile.name: Sebastian Markbåge
profile.headline: Principal Software Engineer at Vercel | Core Contributor to React & Next.js | Web Standards Enthusiast
profile.about: I am a Principal Software Engineer at Vercel, dedicated to advancing the state of web development through innovative framework design and implementation. With a deep background in JavaScript and web standards, I've played a significant role in developing technologies that empower millions of developers worldwide, including contributions to React and Next.js. My passion lies in building scalable, performant, and developer-friendly tools that shape the future of the web.
